Package processing.awt

Class PShapeJava2D

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PShape
processing.core.PShapeSVG
processing.awt.PShapeJava2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
PConstants
public class PShapeJava2D extends PShapeSVG
Implements features for PShape that are specific to AWT and Java2D. At the moment, this is gradients and java.awt.Paint handling.
